rows.label: qev092601_MSG0001
rows.name: Pop quiz time, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0002
rows.name: You get an urgent, life-or-death request from a Nopon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0003
rows.name: You're supposed to meet him here, but he's hours late...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0004
rows.name: What do you do?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0010
rows.name: Search

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you track him down right away.

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0020
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you stay put and wait for him to arrive.

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0005
rows.name:
You're always in such a hurry, Chief!
Reminds me of how I used to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm not sure that's such a good idea. If I leave now,
he might come here and miss me in passing, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0007
rows.name:
I say be patient and wait.
Besides, it's been forever since we had time to talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0008
rows.name:
You're always so relaxed, Chief!
...Still, it WOULD be nice to get a little rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0009
rows.name:
It feels good to zone out sometimes.
Lately, it's just been mission after mission, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0010
rows.name: Anyway, we've got the time. Let's chat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0011
rows.name: You remember this place?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0011_2
rows.name: We first met here at this very spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0030
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Mia you remember it like it was yesterday.

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you forgot.

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0012
rows.name: I knew you would. Still, I'm happy to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ha! You're such a kidder.
Still, so much has happened in between...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0014
rows.name:
We've been all over Mira since then.
I managed to become a BLADE...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0015
rows.name: I fell in with the Curators...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0016
rows.name: You and I started going on adventures on the front lines...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0017
rows.name: It all happened so fast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Heh. I wonder what my parents would think
if they were alive to see me now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm still not half the explorers they were,
but I like to think they'd be proud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Mia you're sure her parents would be proud.

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0060
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0061
rows.name:
Tell Mia her folks would think she
still has a lot of growing to do.

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0020
rows.name: Aw, thanks, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0021
rows.name:
I remember once as a kid, I wandered off
to the next town over and got lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0022
rows.name:
When they came to get me, they weren't even mad.
They actually congratulated me on my courage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0023
rows.name: That's probably about what I'd get now, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0024
rows.name: Ha! Yeah, I suppose they would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0025
rows.name:
They were both every bit the drill sergeant Walter is.
Talk about tough love...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0026
rows.name: I guess I need to keep at it, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0027
rows.name: Sorry! Tora run late! Where is friend Mia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0028
rows.name:
That's me. Are you the client?
Gosh, you're adorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0029
rows.name: Tora not adorable! Tora cool. Possibly awesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0030
rows.name: That's what all the Nopon boys say, but...I just see cute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0031
rows.name: Not to worry. Tora about to BECOME awesome![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0032
rows.name: Ooo, lemme guess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0033
rows.name:
The job is for me to find the thing
that's gonna make that happen, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0034
rows.name: Friend smarter than Tora thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0035
rows.name:
What can I say? When you've seen what I've seen,
you can just sense these things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0036
rows.name: And I sense you want...the Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0037
rows.name: Tora not looking for toy, lady.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0038
rows.name: Aww...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0039
rows.name: Tora looking for coin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0040
rows.name: Coin? You need change?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0041
rows.name: Friends know of Nopon caravans roaming Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0042
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0043
rows.name:
Before Nopon can start to sell at caravan,
members must join Nopon Commerce Guild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0044
rows.name:
Oh! And this coin you're after is used
as proof of membership in the guild?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0045
rows.name: FRIEND SO PERCEPTIVE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0046
rows.name:
But yes. With coin in hand,
Tora not lose to stupid Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0047
rows.name: Then Tora can go see dadapon and mamapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Tora why he's upset with Tatsu.

rows.label: qev092601_JNK0080
rows.name: Assume

rows.label: qev092601_SEL0081
rows.name:
Ask whether Tora can't meet his
parents before he obtains the coin.

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0048
rows.name: Stupid Tatsu always bragging about BLADE exploits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0049
rows.name:
That why Tora need to become
big merchant boss and show Tatsu up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0050
rows.name:
Also, Tora parents coming home
from traveling merchant journey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0051
rows.name: Tora swore to be independent by then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0052
rows.name:
If parents get back before Tora is merchant,
Tora die of shamefulness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0053
rows.name:
Tora promised to be independent by time
parents returned from merchant journey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0054
rows.name:
If parents get back before Tora is merchant,
Tora die of shamefulness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0055
rows.name:
Aw, little boys trying to show off
for their parents are so adorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0056
rows.name:
Tora NOT adorable!
...Though Tora concede friend has fair point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0057
rows.name: Parents of Tora roam Mira selling rare and valuable treasures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0058
rows.name: Parents big-time legends among Nopon caravanners![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0059
rows.name: They sound an awful lot like my folks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0060
rows.name:
They'd often leave me for 10 months out of
the year on some crazy adventure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0061
rows.name: So friend understands pain of Tora?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0062
rows.name:
Oh, believe me, I get it. I became a BLADE
because part of me was still chasing them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0063
rows.name: Friend and Tora have much in common.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0064
rows.name:
Tora want to become strong, independent,
cool grown-up like mamapon and dadapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0065
rows.name:
Well, you're already pretty cool in my book,
but keep setting those goals high.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0066
rows.name: Oh ho! Tora feasts on praise! Now Tora satisfied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0067
rows.name: Hey, whoa, let's get back to the plan, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0068
rows.name: You don't want to backpedal on that promise, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0069
rows.name: No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0070
rows.name:
Parents come through area one day of year.
This only chance for Tora to see them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0071
rows.name:
But Tora still no closer to getting
wings on Commerce Guild coin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0071_2
rows.name: Prospects DIRE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0072
rows.name: Will friend help Tora?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0073
rows.name: Of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0073_2
rows.name: For you, I'll take the case at a discount.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0074
rows.name: For one keppo carrot even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0075
rows.name: Don't push it, buddy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0076
rows.name:
Okay, okay. Tora think of something good
by time mission is over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0077
rows.name: Deal. So what's our first step?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0078
rows.name: Nopon elder Nan here in New LA know about coins.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0079
rows.name: But stubborn Nan not take Tora seriously![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0080
rows.name: Maybe friend can pry information about coin from Nan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0081
rows.name: You got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0082
rows.name: Great. Tora run on ahead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092601_MSG0083
rows.name: C'mon, Chief. We'd better keep up.[ST:wait ]
